column4: Creative Legacy and usually I have to check or uncheck the audigy analog digital output jack to get it to work.
Check and uncheck your analog/digital jack setting in the mixer. It could help you, it has myself in the past.
You might do a hardware check in your administration menu and see what the operating system is recognizing as hardware.
when talking to someone, make sure that you include their nick at the start of your messages.  Also, try typing the first couple letters of their nick then pressing TAB
